Janet Ruppert
ResearchWork and TeachingOrganizingPublications

As a PhD Candidate in Information Science at the University of Colorado Boulder, I work with Ricarose Roque in the Creative Communities Research Group and Ben Shapiro in the Laboratory for Playful Computation. I earned my B.S. in Management Information Systems from the Department of Information Systems, Statistics and Management Science from the University of Alabama in 2018.
